thread.title: Woman’s yoga workout with hunky personal trainer gets VERY intimate – as her shocked boyfriend watches on secret camera

author: sbarns
title: Woman’s yoga workout with hunky personal trainer gets VERY intimate – as her shocked boyfriend watches on secret camera
text:
Mrs Crunch 'They're basically having sex' Woman’s yoga workout with hunky personal trainer gets VERY intimate – as her shocked boyfriend watches on secret camera 
The jaw-dropping scenes, which were filmed on a hidden cam, have been uploaded to YouTube channel, To Catch A Cheater By SARAH BARNS 17th February 2017, 9:32 am A GYM bunny was propositioned by a hunky personal trainer in a sting set up by her boyfriend to find out if she would be unfaithful to him. 
The jaw-dropping scenes, which were filmed on a hidden cam, have been uploaded to YouTube channel, To Catch A Cheater , who regularly orchestrate honey-traps to fool philandering spouses. How to catch a cheater 5 The personal trainer helps the woman stretch her legs – as her boyfriend watches the intimate scenes on a hidden camera 
The film begins with the blonde woman, who is not identified but is believed to be from America, lifting weights. 
A fitness instructor, who is played by an actor, then comes over and offers to give her some advice. 
“I’m actually a personal trainer at this gym, do you mind if I give you a few pointers?” he says. 
“Yeah, go ahead,” she replies. How to catch a cheater The trainer leans into her during the steamy 18 minute session How to catch a cheater The pair get extremely close – much to the annoyance of her partner 
Unbeknown to her, her boyfriend Peter is watching the pair’s exchange via a candid camera. 
The trainer shows her how to lift the barbell before standing extremely close to her as she does it. 
He then tells her to “spread your legs a bit”. 
The trainer then takes her to a private yoga room to “show her a few workouts”. 
She lies on her back on the mat while he holds her leg in the air and leans into her body. How to catch a cheater The actor finishes their session by hitting her bum and then asks for her number 
By this point, Peter is getting quite flustered. 
“Oh yeah, just stretching! They’re having sex with their clothes on!” he yells. 
The pair enjoy a steamy 18 minute session. 
It ends with the trainer massaging her legs and then spanking her bum. 
“We should hook up some time,” he flirts. Related Stories BEATING FOR CHEATING Shocking moment cheating husband is attacked by his wife's family after catching him in bed with love rival THE CHEAT SHEET Worried your man is having an affair? Here are 5 tell-tale signs... according to a sought-after mistress Spanner in the works Plumber is propositioned by 'horny' actress as his girlfriend watches on hidden camera... but does he take the bait? 'I had to catch him in the act' Mum uses Find My iPhone app to track down 'cheating' husband at his alleged lover's house WHOPPER MISTAKE Guy gets caught out cheating after complaining on Burger King’s Instagram page 
The girl tells him she has a boyfriend but they still exchange numbers and hug goodbye. 
Peter is extremely emotional but he can’t decide if what he has just witnessed classes as cheating. 
“I don’t wanna see somebody else stretching her out,” he moans. 
“He touched her. They’re basically having sex!” 
Peter admits at the end of experiment that he actually wants to catch his girlfriend cheating, so he has a good reason to break up with her. How to catch a cheater 5 The trainer massages her bottom and the tops of her thighs 
The pair have been dating since school, she is his first and only girlfriend, but he wants to dates other women. 
The video was uploaded in January and has since racked up over 1.2 million views. 
“This guy still asks if that’s cheating when they’re low-key grinding,” commented one social media user. 
While another added: “Dude, let me help you… YES she was cheating. DUH!” 
But this isn’t the first sting to sweep the web. 
Earlier this week we reported on a plumber being propositioned by a “horny” lingerie-clad actress as his girlfriend watches on a hidden camera. Plumber resists charms of scantily clad homeowner as his girlfriend secretly watches
